page.title: 15A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: { }At{09.58}I got up and watched T.V. Then I had breakfast. After I'd been on my bike my mum said "Could you go to Spar for me ?" so I did. At{10.45}I counted my money. Then I cleaned my sports gear out and got my tennis bats and had a game of tennis against the wall. At{12.00}I had my dinner of cheese on toast and sunbathed until{13.55. After that I watched Sunday Grandstand, the cricket between Nottingham and Sussex. My brother then told me there was a frog in our pond so we had a look and there was. By now it was{tea_time. }I had chicken and ham pie, sweetcorn and for pudding I had a choc ice. Then I had my bath and went to bed.
